IDK something with figures to kind of showcase different trends...

```{r}

library(ggradar)
library(patchwork)
library(scales)
library(tidyverse)

df = rbind(read.csv("data/processed/topology_bodymassratio.csv"),
                    read.csv("data/processed/topology_pfim.csv")) %>% 
        # to get the ratio
        mutate(ratio = top/basal,
                top = NULL,
                basal = NULL) %>%
        pivot_longer(
            cols = c(complexity, distance, connectance, ratio, S1, S2, S4, S5), 
            names_to = "stat",
            values_to = "stat_val")

ggplot(df) +
    geom_line(aes(x = as.numeric(as.factor(df$id)), 
                    y = stat_val, 
                    colour = model)) +
    geom_point(aes(x = as.numeric(as.factor(df$id)), 
                y = stat_val, 
                colour = model)) +
    facet_wrap(vars(stat),
                scales = 'free') +
    scale_size(guide = 'none') +
    theme_classic() +
    xlab("time") +
    ylab("value") +
    theme(panel.border = element_rect(colour = 'black',
                                      fill = "#ffffff00"),
            axis.text.x = element_blank(),
            axis.ticks.x = element_blank())

```
